class conlang.Language(name: str, config: LanguageConfig, vocabulary: Vocabulary | None = None)[source]ÔÉÅ

Bases: object

Represents a language, including its configuration and vocabulary.

nameÔÉÅ

The name of the language.

Type:

str

configÔÉÅ

The configuration for phonemes, patterns, and stress.

Type:

LanguageConfig

vocabularyÔÉÅ

The generated vocabulary for the language.

Type:

Vocabulary

generate_vocabulary(glosses: List[str] | None = None)[source]ÔÉÅ

Generates a vocabulary for the language based on glosses.

Parameters:

glosses (List[str], optional) ‚Äì A list of glosses to use for the vocabulary. Defaults to the SWADESH list.

generate_word(rank: int = -1) → str[source]ÔÉÅ

Generates a word based on the language‚Äôs configuration and word frequency rank.

Parameters:

rank (int) ‚Äì The rank of the word for frequency purposes. Defaults to -1.

Returns:

The generated word.

Return type:

str

class conlang.LanguageConfig(phonemes: Dict[str, List[str]], patterns: List[str], stress: List[int])[source]ÔÉÅ

Bases: object

Represents the configuration of a language, including its phonemes, patterns, and stress rules.

phonemesÔÉÅ

A dictionary mapping categories to phoneme lists.

Type:

Dict[str, List[str]]

patternsÔÉÅ

A list of word patterns.

Type:

List[str]

stressÔÉÅ

A list of stress positions.

Type:

List[int]

Parameters:

Returns:

The parsed language configuration.

LanguageConfig

class conlang.SoundChange(rules: Dict[str, List[Tuple[str]]], wildcards: Dict | None = None)[source]ÔÉÅ

Bases: object

A class to handle phonological sound changes using defined rules and wildcards.

rulesÔÉÅ

A dictionary mapping phonemes to lists of tuples, where each tuple contains the new phoneme and the environment.

Type:

Dict[str, List[Tuple[str]]

wildcardsÔÉÅ

A dictionary mapping wildcard symbols to lists of phonemes.

Type:

Optional[Dict]

apply_to_vocabulary(vocabulary: Vocabulary) → Vocabulary[source]ÔÉÅ

Apply sound changes to an entire vocabulary.

Parameters:

vocabulary (Vocabulary) ‚Äì The input vocabulary.

Returns:

A new vocabulary with transformed words.

Return type:

Vocabulary

apply_to_word(word: str) → str[source]ÔÉÅ

Apply sound changes to a single word based on defined rules.

Parameters:

word (str) ‚Äì The input word.

Returns:

The transformed word.

Return type:

str

string (str) ‚Äì The string containing rules and wildcards.
